text: Cleveland Orenthal Brown Jr. is a fictional character in the television shows Family Guy and The Cleveland Show. He is the son of Cleveland Brown and Loretta Brown. He was first shown to be thin and active. In The Cleveland Show, he was changed to be older and more obese. Mike Henry was the voice actor for Cleveland Jr. when he was first seen in Family Guy. Kevin Michael Richardson became the voice actor when he was in The Cleveland Show and in Family Guy episodes after that. He is 14 years old. Cleveland got custody of Cleveland Jr. when Loretta got a divorce. They moved to a fictional city in Virginia named Stoolbend. Cleveland married Donna Brown and her children (Rallo and Roberta Tubbs) became Cleveland Jr.'s stepsiblings. == References == Category:Family Guy characters Category:The Cleveland Show Category:Fictional African-American people Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2000 Category:Animated human characters
title: Cleveland Brown Jr.
